parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the crank position sensor can cause the engine to stall or die, leading to a loss of power and control, which can result in accidents or injuries, especially when riding at high speeds.
symptoms: the motorcycle hesitates or jerks violently
the tachometer jumps up in RPM.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Valve Sticking and Engine Performance Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sticking of valves can cause severe power loss, making the motorcycle difficult and dangerous to drive, and can lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: the motorcycle is difficult to drive
the motorcycle dies at red lights or low engine revolutions
the motorcycle experiences heavy backfiring and flames coming out of the exhaust.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Ignition Module and Fuel Pump Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ignition module and fuel pump can cause the engine to stall or die, leading to a loss of power and control, which can result in accidents or injuries, especially when riding at high speeds.
symptoms: the engine hesitates or jerks violently.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the crankshaft position sensor can cause the engine to stall or lose power, leading to a loss of control and potential accidents, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: The engine stalls or loses power
the bike may die or cut off suddenly
the engine may stall for a few seconds before restarting
the bike may require the clutch to be pulled and gas to be given to keep it running.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Fuel Pump Housing Crack and Fuel Leak
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A cracked fuel pump housing can cause a fuel leak, which can lead to a fire hazard, especially in the presence of an ignition source.
symptoms: fuel leak from the secondary fuel tank

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A faulty crank position sensor can cause the engine to stumble or misfire, leading to a loss of power and control, which can be unsafe, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: especially at high RPMs (around 3400 RPM) in 4th or 5th gear
